metadata.title: AI Sticker Generator | Custom Anime Sticker Maker | AnividAI
metadata.description: Create adorable anime stickers instantly with our professional AI sticker generator. Transform OCs and photos into custom stickers for Discord and WhatsApp.

pixar_style.name: Pixar Style
pixar_style.description: Pixar-inspired sticker with 3D cartoon rendering, expressive faces, and a polished, cinematic look.

pixel_art.name: Pixel Art
pixel_art.description: Retro pixel art sticker in 8-bit or 16-bit style, with a transparent background and a limited color palette.

watercolor_soft.name: Watercolor Soft
watercolor_soft.description: Soft watercolor sticker with gentle color transitions, pastel palette, and artistic hand-painted texture.

pop_art.name: Pop Art
pop_art.description: Bold pop art sticker inspired by comic books, featuring vibrant colors, halftone patterns, and strong outlines.

graffiti.name: Graffiti
graffiti.description: Urban graffiti sticker with bold spray paint effects, dynamic lines, and street art style.

chibi.name: Chibi
chibi.description: Cute chibi-style sticker featuring exaggerated, adorable characters and playful, rounded text.

minimal_line.name: Minimal Line Art
minimal_line.description: Minimalist line art sticker with clean, simple lines and a flat 2D design. Transparent background, perfect for digital messaging.

no_preset.name: No Preset
no_preset.description: Generate stickers without preset style. The AI will determine the best style based on your input and reference image.

oc_nine_grid.name: OC Nine Grid
oc_nine_grid.description: Generate a single image with 9 sticker expressions arranged in a 3x3 grid layout. Each cell shows the OC with a different emotion.

tool.title: Professional AI Sticker Generator
tool.templateDescription: Choose a unique style for your creation

inputMode.title: Generation Mode
inputMode.nineGridDesc: Generate 9 stickers with different expressions from your OC character in one click.
inputMode.textOnlyDesc: Create simple text-based stickers like "boom" or "lol".
inputMode.textWithReferenceDesc: Combine text with an image for detailed anime stickers.
inputMode.ocCharacterDesc: Turn your OC into personalized stickers for Discord and social media.

Introduce.title: The Best AI Sticker Generator for Custom Anime Stickers
Introduce.description: AnividAI's AI sticker generator helps you transform original characters and photos into high-quality anime stickers instantly. Using our advanced AI sticker generator, you can create character-consistent Discord and WhatsApp stickers in seconds. Whether you're a creator looking to expand your digital collection or just want personalized emojis for your community, this professional tool offers 9 unique styles to match your vision.
Introduce.tagline: The Ultimate Custom Anime AI Sticker Generator

benefits.subtitle: Experience the most advanced anime sticker generation online

howToUse.title: Create Stickers with the AI Sticker Generator in 4 Steps
howToUse.subtitle: Transform your imagination into adorable stickers effortlessly

steps.title: Select a Style
steps.description: Choose from 9 unique templates in the AI sticker generator like Chibi Cute, Pixel Art, or Nine Grid.

steps.title: Upload Reference
steps.description: Upload a photo to the AI sticker generator. Our AI analyzes the design to ensure a consistent result.

steps.title: Customize Details
steps.description: Add custom expressions in the AI sticker generator to get the perfect look for your community.

steps.title: Generate & Download
steps.description: Watch your creation come to life! Our AI sticker generator exports high-resolution PNGs with transparent backgrounds.

items.question: What makes this AI sticker generator unique?
items.answer: Our AI sticker generator focuses on professional quality and character consistency, staying true to your original design.

items.question: Is there a free AI sticker generator version?
items.answer: Yes! You can start using our AI sticker generator for free using our credit system to test our different styles.

items.question: Can I use the AI sticker generator for Discord?
items.answer: Absolutely. The AI sticker generator exports high-resolution PNG files specifically optimized for Discord stickers.

items.question: Does the AI sticker generator maintain my character's look?
items.answer: Yes, our AI sticker generator is optimized for character consistency across different expressions and styles.

items.question: What styles does the AI sticker generator support?
items.answer: The AI sticker generator currently offers 9 styles: Pixar Style, Chibi, Line Art, Pop Art, Pixel Art, Watercolor, Graffiti, and the exclusive OC Nine Grid collection.

items.question: Do I need artistic skills for the AI sticker generator?
items.answer: No design skills are needed. Simply provide a reference, and our AI sticker generator handles the entire creative process.

call_to_action.title: Ready to Try the Best AI Sticker Generator?
call_to_action.subtitle: Join thousands of creators using our AI sticker generator to make custom anime stickers today.
